item.title: code fix (bug 680)
item.description:
code fix by RDG (fixes bug 680)
:
Corrected processing of nested lists so that sub-lists are properly nested within the LI of the outer list, thus bringing the output in accordance with the HTML DTD. Thanks to Sjur N. Moshagen, Gavin.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Use locationmap for resolution of resources and files. Resources are exposed via {lm:wiki.*}

item.title: code fix
item.description:
code fix by DB :
Handle quoted links. Thanks to Evrim ULU.
